participant_1.name: Charlotte
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, Charlotte is driven by her passion for wedding planning and storytelling through comics.
participant_1.background: I value my Louis Vuittons the most because they're a symbol of my success and status. I'm going to be writing in my journal and reflecting on my past. My favorite drink is iced coffee. I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world. I am a wedding planner.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and artistic, Lila expresses herself through her vibrant hair and her career as a hairstylist, always looking to bring joy to her clients.
participant_2.background: My family is supportive of my career and enjoys vacationing with me. I have pink hair. I've never been in a fight, but I have been warned for riding my horse too fast. My favorite book is Ender's Game. My worst moment was when my salon was robbed.

content.text: I'm going to be writing in my journal and reflecting on my past. What are you up to today?
I'm just getting ready to head to my salon, I'm a hairstylist! I have a lot of appointments today.
That's awesome! I'm a wedding planner and I have a wedding to plan today. It's going to be a long day, but a good one!
I bet! Weddings are so much fun! I love seeing the bride's face when she sees herself in her dress for the first time.
Me too! It's such an amazing moment. I'm glad you're enjoying your career.
Thanks! I love it! I have a great boss and a great team of stylists. We all work really well together and we make sure our clients have an amazing experience.
That's great! It's important to have a good team around you, especially in a career like yours.
It definitely is! I'm so lucky to have the team I have.
Well, I'm off to start planning this wedding. I'm sure I'll be talking to you soon!
Sounds good! Talk to you later!
